title: Rational rock-salt phase engineering of nickel-rich layered cathode interface for enhanced rate and cycling stability
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04110G, Paper
Wenjie Wang, Yanke Shi, Pengfei Li, Ruiqing Wang, Fei Ye, Xiaoyu Zhang, Wei Li, Zhuosen Wang, Chunyang Xu, Dongqing Xu, Qun Xu, Xinwei Cui
Ni-rich layered cathodes promise high energy density, yet suffer from dramatic rate and capacity decay on cycling, which is originated from chemo-mechanical failures with fast growth of electrical and ionic...
